segments.keyframe_prompt: Mediterranean restaurant outdoor terrace at golden hour, white linen tablecloths, terracotta pots with olive trees, turquoise sea in background, warm sunset light casting long shadows, empty elegant table setting with wine glasses, bougainvillea flowers, photorealistic, shot on ARRI Alexa, 8K, shallow depth of field, cinematic color grading

segments.motion_prompt: Slow push-in toward the dish, olive oil catching the light as it falls, steam rising gently, subtle camera movement creating intimate feeling, warm golden tones
